sys_template.name: Branch - Lock Ports - DEADLOCK
sys_template.short_description: DEADLOCKED ports found on Branch/Central system
sys_template.template: short_description=DEADLOCKED ports found on Branch/Central system^instructions=Only to be used for DEADLOCKS that show up in List Locked Processes or when using LIST ILOCKS command in TCL. Please include the LIST ILOCKS in the troubleshooting notes. Record details of what routines the locked ports were in Ensure CI is the routine that was locked^affected_system=^cmdb_ci=^close_notes=Lock was between GIN and SOE Y/N [ ] Senior/Manager logged one of the ports off lock now cleared^contact_type=phone^impact=3^category=^subcategory=^close_code=
